author: Simon Difford
description: "Berry nice!" Was the comment from the other side of the bar when this lightly fruity, botanically influenced fruitini was first bar tested.
name: Blackberry Martini
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
